title: quiz-11-arithmetic
author: Phoenix Admission Care
questions: Every day, Rahim sells 10 litres of milk at TK 45 per litre, but he has to pay the municipal corporation TK 50 as a tax every week. In September 2021, how much money does Ratiram make?

Flora's fishing company catches 9000 kg of fresh fish every month. The selling price of fresh fish is TK 30/kg and the selling price of dried fish is TK 120/kg, but when fresh fish is dried it remains l/4th of its weight. If flora sells dried fish, how much more money will she get than if she sells fresh fish?

Ratul can finish a work in 12 hours but he works for 8 hours only and the remaining work was done by Ahad, whose rate of working is just 20% of what Ratul can do. How much time did Ahad works to complete that remaining work ?
Selim can do a certain job in 12 days and Jamal is 60% more efficient than Selim. Jamal does the same piece of work in ?
What is the mean of the first 10 even integers?
The average of 20 numbers is zero. Of them, at the most, how many may be greater than zero?
The average weight of 8 person's increases by 2.5 kg when a new person comes in place of one of them weighing 65 kg. What might be the weight of the new person?
What is the probability of getting exactly one head in tossing a pair of coins?
What is the probability of getting less than 3 in a single throw of a dice?
If an event cannot occur, then its probability is ?
